name: Chaosroach
description:
So That was one hell of a week , but I've managed to finish my game ! 

A very small thing can cause BIG trouble , that's the case in here , in this cafe , you spot a cock roach in your coffee ! , so the most reasonable thing to do is  to walk out of the cafe , right ? , WRONG , you kill the damn cockroach , the CHAOSROACH .

CONTROLL:-

WASD/left stick : move

LMB/right trigger : attack

RMB/left trigger : throw

E/north button : pick up

I hope that you enjoy the game :D
